entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Donald Trump was right all along when he talked about manufacturing in America. Coronavirus simply proved him right. He's not only fighting to preserve the USA, but all Western Civilization, built on Greco-Roman, Judeo-Christian and French Enlightenment values.
